snippet: Innovation is slowly expanding the versatility of North Fork winemaking, with three offbeat dry whites and an unusual light-colored sparkling red illustrating the success.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews dry white wines from Palmer Vineyards in Aquebogue and Raphael in Peconic, and a sparkling red from Jamesport Vineyards (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Innovation is slowly expanding the versatility of North Fork winemaking, with three offbeat dry whites and an unusual light-colored sparkling red illustrating the success.

headline.seo: In North Fork, Innovations Expand the Versatility of Wines
